Dear Mr. Underwood,
It was exceedingly thoughtful of you to write to me conÂ¬
cerning the 21 stations which carried the Barnard Forum program.
I was delighted to learn that so many stations broadcast the
program, particularly all ninety minutes I
From time to time we may have other programs of interest

Yours sincerely.
(Mrs.) Phyllis Michelfelder
